fullplot: The fantastical tale of a little girl who won't - or can't - follow the rules. Confounded by her clashes with the rule-obsessed world around her, Phoebe seeks enlightenment from her unconventional drama teacher, as her brilliant but anguished mother begins to worry for her daughter's health.
plot: Confounded by her clashes with the seemingly rule-obsessed world, a troubled young girl seeks enlightenment from her unconventional drama teacher.
title: Phoebe in Wonderland

tomatoes.consensus: Blessed with a good cast, Phoebe's heart is in the right place, but its execution is dicey.
